vendor_name: Great trails Kodaikanal by GRT Hotels
title: Nature Escape in Kodaikanal
description: Enjoy fresh mountain air and sweeping mountain views with a three-night stay at the brand new Great trails Kodaikanal by GRT hotels, located a scenic 20-minute drive from Kodaikanal city centre. Take in breathtaking views of the valley and indulge in two multi-course dinners, one multi-course lunch and 30% discount on thrilling adventures like ziplining and more.
location_description: Great trails Kodaikanal by GRT hotels
